Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 82nd overall pick, by Texas in 1993...
Injured on 8/29/1993 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/21/1994 with a Bruised Hip, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/31/1995 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 6/2/1996, off Mike Witt (NYY)...
Injured on 5/24/1997 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Released by Texas on 5/26/1997...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/17/1998 to a 2-year deal worth $864,000 per year...
